content:
Hey all. I'm moving from VSCode to Sublime because of performance (I'm at a tiny, old computer), yet I can't seem to figure out how to configure it properly. I installed rust-analyzer by running rustup component add rust-src. I configured Sublime as per the instructions at the readme. Yet I get this popup when I first open up a Rust source:

Could not start rust-analyzer. [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'rust-analyzer'. Server will be disabled for this window)

What did I miss? Thanks in advance.

rust-src does not install rust-analyzer, you need this:
https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/tree/master/docs/user#language-server-binary
